name: Tailwind CSS
summary: Master Tailwind CSS through 4 structured learning steps.
longDescription: Tailwind CSS is a powerful technology that every modern developer should master. Our structured learning path guides you through 4 essential steps, from foundational concepts to advanced techniques. Each step includes curated resources from official documentation, ensuring you learn from authoritative and up-to-date sources. Whether you're a beginner or looking to deepen your expertise, this learning path provides the guidance you need.

steps.title: Installation
steps.description: Set up Tailwind CSS in your project.

steps.title: Core Concepts
steps.description: Understand utility-first fundamentals and responsive design.

steps.title: Customization
steps.description: Configure and extend Tailwind to match your design system.

steps.title: Layout & Spacing
steps.description: Master flexbox, grid, and spacing utilities.

faqs.question: What is Tailwind CSS and why should I learn it?
faqs.answer: Tailwind CSS is a widely-used framework in modern software development. Learning Tailwind CSS will help you build better applications and make you more marketable as a developer.

faqs.question: How long does it take to learn Tailwind CSS?
faqs.answer: The time to learn Tailwind CSS varies based on your background and dedication. With consistent practice, most developers become proficient within 2-4 weeks of focused study.

faqs.question: What are the prerequisites for learning Tailwind CSS?
faqs.answer: Before diving into Tailwind CSS, you should have a solid foundation in programming fundamentals. Check our learning path prerequisites for specific requirements.
